duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support from concept to design to final development.
Master knowledge of all styles, raw materials, and fabrics related to the category.
Assist with the management of cross-functional communication between merchants, production, technical design, and external vendors.
Help to organize and keep track of samples.
Assist in sketching designs in Illustrator (flats).
Prepare PLM packages and update them as needed.
Assist with the preparation of presentation boards for seasonal/milestone meetings.
Conduct design research as directed by department head.
Review lab dips, samples, and submits with category leader and enter/send comments to vendors.
Prepare line sheets and update as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Fashion or Art (or equivalent experience and education)
